summary: Chicken tikka masala is a popular dish made with bite-sized pieces of chicken that are first marinated and then cooked in a spicy, creamy sauce. The sauce has a vibrant orange color. This delicious meal was invented by South Asian chefs in the United Kingdom and has since become a global favorite, served in restaurants worldwide. It's a tasty blend of traditional flavors with a British twist!
title: Chicken tikka masala
